function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unsanitary interview conditions may promote the spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Potential for interviewees and interviewers to be at risk of contracting contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Ensure sanitary conditions in interview environments, provide protective equipment if necessary, and conduct interviews remotely when possible","Technologies":"Remote interview software, sanitation equipment, protective gear","People":"Interviewers, interviewees, research participants","Owner":"Researchers, interview organizers"},{"Description":"Close proximity during interviews may increase the risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease spread due to close contact between interviewers and interviewees","Mitigation":"Maintain social distancing during interviews, limit the number of people present, and provide adequate ventilation in interview spaces","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, social distancing guidelines, remote interview software","People":"Interviewers, interviewees, research participants","Owner":"Researchers, interview organizers"},{"Description":"Extended data collection process may expose interviewees and interviewers to multiple sources of contagion","Impact":"Prolonged exposure to different interview environments and participants increases the risk of disease exposure","Mitigation":"Minimize the duration of interviews, rotate interview locations, and conduct health screenings for participants","Technologies":"Health screening tools, scheduling software for location rotation, remote interview software","People":"Interviewers, interviewees, research participants","Owner":"Researchers, interview organizers"}]}
